mapper.select: select id, titleId, teacherNumber, studentNumber, name, introduction, fileurl, upladData, versionKey, version, approvalData, approval from ordworld.projectFile where id = #{id}
select id, titleId, teacherNumber, studentNumber, name, introduction, fileurl, upladData, versionKey, version, approvalData, approval from ordworld.projectFile limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into ordworld.projectFile(titleId, teacherNumber, studentNumber, name, introduction, fileurl, upladData, versionKey, version, approvalData, approval) values (#{titleid}, #{teachernumber}, #{studentnumber}, #{name}, #{introduction}, #{fileurl}, #{upladdata}, #{versionkey}, #{version}, #{approvaldata}, #{approval})
mapper.update:
update ordworld.projectFile
titleId = #{titleid},
teacherNumber = #{teachernumber},
studentNumber = #{studentnumber},
name = #{name},
introduction = #{introduction},
fileurl = #{fileurl},
upladData = #{upladdata},
versionKey = #{versionkey},
version = #{version},
approvalData = #{approvaldata},
approval = #{approval},
where id = #{id}
